item.title: UPDATE 3-Euro area yields set for weekly rise as markets price fewer ECB rate cuts
item.author: EBR European Business Report
item.description:
(Recasts with rebound in yields, adds comments)
By Stefano Rebaudo
LONDON, April 26 (Reuters) - Euro zone government bond yields were on track for the second straight weekly rise as market expectations for cumulative European Central Bank rate cuts this year dropped way below 75 basis points on th...
